turns.ai_line: Good morning, doctor. I dey feel pain for my belle after I chop leftover rice yesterday. I don also dey feel like I wan vomit and my body dey do me somehow. The place I dey live, food no dey last because e dey hot well well. I no sure if na the rice wey don spoil cause am. This one wey I dey so, I no fit do anything. E dey pain me well well.
turns.user_input: What can I do to help?

turns.ai_line: Doctor, abeg you fit help me check wetin dey worry me? I no fit suffer like this again. I just dey pray say make e no be say the rice wey I chop don spoil. The kind wahala wey I dey face now, e no good at all. E be like say I wan purge sef. Na so so sweat full my body. I no fit do any work with this kind condition.
turns.user_input: What am I supposed to do?

turns.ai_line: Doctor, I dey beg you, I need your help. This pain no be small thing. I just dey hope sey e no be food poison from that rice wey I chop. I fit vomit anytime now and e don dey hard me to chop anything. I just dey weak, dey sweat anyhow. I no fit do any work as e dey so. I need solution fast fast.
